verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Born in the night,
Mary's child,
a long way from your home:
coming in need ,
Mary's child,
born in a borrowed room.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Clear shining Light,
Mary's child,
Your face lights up our way;
light of the world,
Mary's child,
dawn on our darkened day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Truth of our life,
Mary's child,
You tell us God is good;
prove it is true,
Mary's child,
go to your cross of wood.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hope of the world,
Mary's child,
You're coming soon to reign;
King of the earth,
Mary's child,
walk in our streets again.
